hypothesis_content.title: Intra-Week Monday Gap Closure for BTC
hypothesis_content.statement: Price gaps between Friday close and Monday open (>1.2% magnitude) close within the Monday trading session with >68% probability, regardless of regime, providing a mean reversion edge.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend gaps often reflect low-liquidity price discovery that gets 'tested' when full global markets reopen on Monday. Market makers and institutional flows typically fill these gaps as they represent inefficient pricing during thin trading periods.
entry_conditions: Monday 00:00 UTC open price differs from Friday 23:59 UTC close by >1.2%
Position direction: fade the gap (short if gap up, long if gap down)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Gap fully closes (price returns to Friday close level)
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves 0.8% further in gap direction

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Gaps close within Monday session <60% of the time across all regimes. Strategy shows negative expectancy in bear/stress regimes specifically.
